ARABIC: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحْتِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥ يَٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will have awnings of Fire above them and awnings below them. By that Allah strikes fear into His slaves: 'So have taqwa, My slaves, of Me!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Above them will be a covering of fire, below them a cloud (of flames). With this does God warn His creatures: "O My creatures, fear Me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: There shall be sheets of fire above them and beneath them. This is the end against which Allah warns His servants. So dread My wrath, O you servants of Mine!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Above and below them their will be shadows of fire. This is how God frightens His servants. My servants have fear of Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Above them are mountains of fire and beneath them are mountains of fire; Allah scares His bondmen with this; “O My bondmen! Fear Me!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They shall have coverings of Fire, above them and covering (of Fire) beneath them. With this Allah frightens His servants: "O My servants, therefore have Taqwa of Me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They shall have coverings of fire above them and coverings beneath them; with that Allah makes His servants to fear, so be careful of (your duty to) Me, O My servants!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Above them they shall have overshadowings. of the Fire, and underneath them overshadowings; that it is wherewith God frightens His servants: "O My servants, so fear you Me!"'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They have an awning of fire above them and beneath them a dais (of fire). With this doth Allah appal His bondmen. O My bondmen, therefor fear Me!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will have sheets of fire above them and sheets of fire beneath them." That is how God puts fear into the hearts of His servants. Fear me, then, My servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: For them! above them shall be coverings of Fire and beneath them coverings. Therewith Allah affrighteth His bondmen. O My bondmen! wherefore fear Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There will be canopies of fire above them, and [similar] canopies beneath them. With that Allah deters His servants. So, My servants, be wary of Me!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They shall have Layers of Fire above them, and Layers (of Fire) below them: with this doth Allah warn off his servants: "O My Servants! then fear ye Me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They shall have coverings of Fire, above them and covering (of Fire) beneath them; with this Allah does frighten His slaves: "O My slaves, therefore fear Me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Above them they shall have layers of fire and beneath them layers. By this Allah puts fear into His worshipers' 'O My worshipers, fear Me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will have layers of Fire above them, and layers beneath them. That is how God strikes fear into His servants—“O My servants! Beware of Me!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will have canopies of fire above them and below them, canopies. By that Allah threatens His servants. O My servants, then fear Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:16] Above them they will have canopies, layers, of fire, and beneath them [they will have [similar] canopies, of fire. That is what God frightens His servants with, that is, the believing ones, that they may have fear of Him — this [sense of the verse] is suggested by [what follows]), “So, O servants of Mine, fear Me!”’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They have) i.e. the disbelievers of Mecca (an awning) canopies (of fire above them and beneath them a dais (of fire). With this doth Allah appal His bondmen) in the Qur'an. (0 My bondmen) He means Abu Bakr and his fellow believers, (therefore fear Me) therefore obey Me in that which I have commanded you!
